page.title: 14Entertainment and Weather.
page.content: They cross to the mainland by boat for shopping,school and entertainment.Those who do not have their own boats use the Castle or National Trust boats.They find Poole and Bournemouth ideal for shopping and when they go out for the day they might go somewhere like Salisbury. For entertainment on the island there is a bar at the castle,croquet,and badminton.Most people have a T.V.They do not find it lonely in the winter,as they enjoy the peace.The houses are Victorian with old pictures and antique furniture and the inhabitants have their own private beach. The weather varies a good deal, but it is mainly hot in the summer and can be rough in the winter.The sea has never frozen over, but there have been blocks of ice in it.
